title: BT Exclusive: First look of Athiya Shetty in 'Hero'
text:
The first look of Athiya Shetty from Nikhil Advani's romantic entertainer Hero, being produced by Salman Khan and Subhash Ghai.
http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/followceleb.cms?alias=Subhash Ghai,Salman Khan,Nikhil Advani,Hero,Athiya Shetty Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
